column5: Anyone else going into quebec the opening week in june? Going in june 4-11 - would love to hear reports when others going same week get back - should hit ice out perfectly!! Huge pike on the horizon!!!!!
My last trip couple seasons ago was last week in May. We hammered some nice pike and found a lot of eye. This winter being much more severe in NE i think you are going to hit it perfect. Good luck
I'm arriving on the 11th for a week in Quebec. I'm looking forward to it!!!!! Best of luck.

June 10th I'll be leaving for the Gouin. We should have some early reports out of Quebec soon...at least I hope so.Current weather at Parent is looking good: highs 55-68 & lows staying above freezing. http://www.weatheroffice.gc.ca/forec...l?qc-a1&unit=i
